00052 #define USER_PAGE    0x0FE00000UL /* Address to flash memory */
00053 
00055 /**************************************************************************/
00062 __STATIC_INLINE void BSP_TraceProfilerEnable(bool enable)
00063 {
00064   uint32_t          data;
00065   volatile uint32_t *userpage = (uint32_t *) USER_PAGE;
00066 
00067   /* Check that configuration needs to change */
00068   data = *userpage;
00069   if (enable)
00070   {
00071     if (data == 0xFFFFFFFF)
00072     {
00073       return;
00074     }
00075   }
00076   else
00077   {
00078     if (data == 0x00000000)
00079     {
00080       return;
00081     }
00082   }
00083 
00084   /* Initialize MSC */
00085   MSC_Init();
00086 
00087   /* Write enable or disable trigger word into flash */
00088   if (enable)
00089   {
00090     data = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00091     MSC_ErasePage((uint32_t *) USER_PAGE);
00092     MSC_WriteWord((uint32_t *) USER_PAGE, (void *) &data, 4);
00093   }
00094   else
00095   {
00096     data = 0x00000000;
00097     MSC_ErasePage((uint32_t *) USER_PAGE);
00098     MSC_WriteWord((uint32_t *) USER_PAGE, (void *) &data, 4);
00099   }
00100 }
00101 
00102 #ifdef __cplusplus
00103 }
00104 #endif
00105 
00109 #endif  /* (defined(BSP_ETM_TRACE) && defined( ETM_PRESENT )) || defined( GPIO_ROUTE_SWOPEN ) */
00110 #endif  /* __BSP_TRACE_H */
